result.name: coventry-allotments
result.notes: The data shows the location of allotments within the administrative boundary of Coventry City.

organization.name: coventry-city-council
organization.title: Coventry City Council
organization.description: Coventry City Council is a metropolitan authority located in the city of Coventry, England. The Council has a ten year vision to be globally connected promoting the growth of a sustainable Coventry economy and locally committed to improving the quality of life for Coventry people.  The city's Digital Coventry strategy commits the Council and city to supporting open data and innovation.  Further insight and analysis is available on the Council's information and statistics hub at https://www.coventry.gov.uk/infoandstats/.
